Description:
YOU YANGS ARE YOUR VIEW BACK DROP
Whether you are relaxing on the balcony or hard at work in the kitchen you will be positioned perfectly to watch the ships coast through the bay with the You Yang's as there back drop.
Situated in the quiet and elevated Taronga Court is this brick veneer home. The kitchen is neat and is well equipped with plenty of bench and cupboard space and tiled floor. The family room has timber floor boards providing a nice warm feeling and access to the sunny north facing balcony.
The master bedroom features an ensuite and all 3 bedrooms offer BIR's and study nooks. Behind the double carport you will find a workshop/studio as well as a separate garden shed. Under the house is another large sealed storage area.
A 9000lt water tank services the garden with an electric pump. The back yard is enormous and the size of the land provides many options for a pool if desired.
With a little work this home can be restored to its former glory. The bathrooms are done and the kitchen is very functional. So if you are looking for a project with a view then why not arrange to have a look.
Insights: 6 Taronga Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 23 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Impressive family home
Offering the warmth of a well loved family home, great street appeal & low maintenance gardens. The built in slow combustion wood fireplace is a feature in the spacious family lounge. The lounge extends from the front of the house to the back & could be a library nook or a place for the musician.
A separate dining room could work as a casual lounge.
The kitchen with Kleenmaid dishwasher, rangehood, induction hotplates, wall oven & a pull out pantry.
A bay window makes the master bedroom light filled, with walk through robe & roomy ensuite.
The central bathroom services two spacious north facing bedrooms, both with built in robes.
The large covered entertaining area makes a great outdoor space.
There are two split systems air-conditioners to heat the whole house in winter and cool it down in summer.
Clifton Springs is emerging as an exciting new opportunity on the Bellarine Peninsula for those seeking bayside living, the beaches are building up after groin works & the bay offers safe shallow swimming. Clifton Springs sheltered boat harbour is one of the best on the west side of Port Phillip Bay. With Coles, Safeway & Aldi stores just minutes away & with Bunnings & Kmart just 15 minutes down the road, this is a great town to live in.
Insights: 23 Bay Shore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Location with Room for the Boat!
Located in a quiet cul-de-sac this 544m2 allotment will please plenty of buyer types. This corner block offers dual vehicle access via the front and side boundaries, very handy if you need a place to keep the caravan or boat - and boasts a 17m wide parcel giving you amazing scope to build a spacious family home while the North facing backyard means you'll be able to take full advantage of the sun all year round! The property also enjoys an elevated position giving the lucky purchaser potential for a fantastic outlook from their new home. From this location you'll be able to enjoy walking distance to the beach as well as a wealth of local amenities close by such as Drysdale shopping precinct, Clifton Springs Primary School, Day Care facilities, Curlewis shopping centre, Clifton Springs Golf club and many more. With title available you'll be able to get started on your new home immediately. Don't hesitate and call today.
Insights: 23 Elise Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Position Position Position
Build your dream home on this beautifully positioned 582m2 block. The elevation takes in Bay Views including the You Yangs and Geelong.
Located meters from cliff top walks and set amongst luxury homes this block is ready to be built on as all connections are available.
Minutes to supermarkets, schools, beaches, boat ramp, wineries, ferry services and everything the Bellarine lifestyle has too offer you.
Also just 20mins to Geelong this location is picture-perfect.
This location won't last long.

Description:
How's The Serenity!
A truly exclusive and limited opportunity to secure what can only be described as 'blue ribbon' real estate on the Bellarine Peninsula. This character filled residence is a visual delight and a genuine 'one of a kind' prospect... believe me, there is no other like this one! Flanked by the expansive native plantations of Griggs Creek Reserve, sweeping views of the bay through the tree tops, the shoreline only a short stroll away and an abundance of bird life creates an unrivalled tranquility to embrace the ultimate 'sea change'
Showcasing great size and scale this residence presents a myriad of floor plan options
In its current form; x5 bedrooms and an expansive open plan living
The master suite serves up a feeling of resort style living; a beautiful en-suite renovation embodies soothing earthy tones with a dash of luxury (sauna, free standing bath etc)
2 spiral staircases lead to two bedrooms, both possess great proportions and eye catching A frame roof lines
The kitchen boasts a country charm and is complemented by a contemporary flair; expansive stone bench tops, as-new stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar, excellent storage solutions and walk in pantry
The primary living zone of this fine property is one that must be seen to be believed; jaw dropping ceiling scale, slate flooring, Coonara heater, custom timber features and a bespoke suspended boat light feature will no doubt be a 'talking point'
All the modern comforts and an impressive inclusions list... and many more fine features to be discovered on further inspection
The A+ location simply cannot be overstated; creekside of Kewarra Drive, close proximity to a thriving retail hub, vibrant cafe scene, local award winning wineries, child friendly walk to schools, the waters edge only a short stroll, easy access to the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp and set within a green leafy pocket of Clifton Springs
This exceptional property offers a great opportunity. Whether it be your dream home, savvy investment or even a lucrative holiday let prospect. Call today to secure your very own piece of paradise!
Insights: 58 Kewarra Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Premium North Backyard
Moving to the Bellarine is a lifestyle change now enjoyed by many. This block with area 548m2 presents a blank canvas for a substantial new home in a boutique pocket close to the Drysdale and Curlewis shopping centres. Surrounded by new homes and within walking distance to the Clifton Springs Primary School and walking path to the shores of Corio Bay.
Central to all services, the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp, Port Phillip Ferry, wineries and cafes of the Bellarine.

Description:
Family Appeal with Future Prospects!
Not every day does an opportunity like 23 Cameo Court present itself where the location is everything and the astute buyer will enjoy the proximity the home is to the Clifton Springs Golf Club and to the famous Clifton Springs Dell and foreshore.
This versatile property, totalling 821sqm (approx.), presents itself as the perfect opportunity for those looking to break into the first home buyer market or those looking to renovate and invest. The home is a blank palette and with the right amount of imagination could be transformed into something special.
Featuring a classic floor-plan design with 3 bedrooms, 2 spacious living rooms and a practical kitchen, the home is offset with new carpets and existing floorboards. With a side access driveway that has enough space to accommodate a boat and a caravan that leads to a single car garage and a backyard which has more than ample space to create a children's playground or design your own picturesque landscaped garden.
Conveniently located, this well presented family home is located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private, multiple choice of shopping centre's close by & access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this fantastic opportunity.
Insights: 23 Cameo Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A Solid Foundation
Set on this generous allotment of 585 sqm is a house waiting for you to make it into a home.
The spacious lounge area with gas-log brick fireplace has plenty of room to stretch out, warm up and invite over friends.
Open dining room has access to the expansive backyard.
The kitchen has more than enough space for preparing, serving and storage. Clean-up is also made a breeze with it's own dishwasher.
Three roomy bedrooms for the family are serviced by a central bathroom.
An outdoor entertaining area provides all the space you need for friends and loved ones to get together.
Lock-up garage and a long driveway down the side of the house means there's plenty of room for the boat or caravan.
Located in the heart of Clifton Springs, only a few minutes drive to the boat ramp and Drysdale town centre.

Address: 175 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Great Investment,Great Home
Here is potential to secure a great investment for the future.
Located only a short walk to the Clifton Springs Golf Club and Dell swimming spot. Enjoy a relaxed meal at the Golf Club whilst admiring the beautiful vistas. Close to public transport and local shopping and schools. The surrounding neighborhood is a great family locale with playgrounds, sporting facilities and beach access.
Spacious open plan living area with as-new split system and fully renovated contemporary kitchen. The dining area has access to an undercover outdoor entertaining deck for those warm summer evenings. Three spacious bedrooms all have BIRs and large windows. The master has ensuite and access to the wrap around balcony.
Parking can be accessed from the side yard where there is ample room for a stand alone garage for the boat or caravan. Downstairs is a converted man-cave which could be reinstated to another garage with room for storage. Dual access is provided on this corner allotment. Land size 577m2

Address: 38 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
As Pretty As A Picture!
Surrounded by picturesque gardens and showcasing north-facing bay views, this home is an absolute treat!
With the coastline positioned a short stroll from your front door, a relaxed lifestyle is yours to keep. The local shops on Centaurus Avenue are also a short walk away, along with public transport and the Beacon Point Reserve. Young families will appreciate easy access to Clifton Springs Pre-School, Clifton Springs Primary School, and Drysdale Primary School. The Clifton Springs Golf Club and Boat Ramp are within easy reach, while the vibrant hub of Drysdale provides you with a wealth of shopping and dining options.
Every inch of this two-storey weatherboard home is as cute as a button. Upstairs is home to the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone, which is flooded with natural light and features a pitched timber ceiling. Opening onto the north-facing balcony, youll love admiring the views over the sparkling bay waters towards the You Yangs. The kitchen features a breakfast bar, built-in pantry and appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas hob, 900mm stainless steel rangehood).
Three bedrooms with built-in robes (one with external access) occupy the lower level, along with the fresh main bathroom and laundry with external access.
Complete with a brand new en suite, the spacious family room offers immense versatility as a teen retreat or games room. Boasting separate access, this room is also ideal as a bedroom for those who enjoy their independence. Ducted heating, a split-system air conditioner, and ceiling fan provide comfort. Lined with established tropical plantings, the sun-drenched alfresco exudes a tropical vibe that is perfect for entertaining. Both the front yard and backyard are graced with established gardens - creating a beautiful oasis that inspires relaxed outdoor living. With the backyard also home to a passionfruit vine, loquat tree, almond tree, lemon tree, and lime tree - you can enjoy fresh produce straight from the branch!
Insights: 38 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
PRICE, POSITION AND POSSIBILITIES!
Sitting neatly on approx 599m2 of land in popular Clifton Springs & only a short distance from local beaches, The Dell and Clifton Springs golf club is this comfortable well designed family home. Offering a spacious living area and 3 bedrooms, all with built in robes including the Master bedroom, this delightful home has space for all the family! Taking pride of the home is the functional well appointed, updated kitchen & spacious dining area with access to the undercover verandah leading to a fantastic outdoor entertaining space at the rear of the home. Ideal for the home handy man is the double garage and garden shed at the end of the lengthy driveway, perfect for storing the boat/caravan etc. This lovely home is perfectly situated with easy access to Geelong CBD and all that the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. A prime investment opportunity!

Description:
EXPRESSIONS OF INTEREST - CLOSING DEC 6TH @ 3PM (Unless sold prior)
Huge block, luxury home, private beach, spectacular views.
Here's a truly rare opportunity to own a unique piece of Clifton Springs' real estate endowed with a massive landscaped garden, an impeccably-presented brick home, a panoramic view of the bay with the You Yangs as a backdrop, and your own absolute beach front. Plus the option to subdivide (current Planning Permit available).
The double block presents a long, tree-lined drive (Golden Elms, Japanese Maple, Manchurian Pear) to the ample parking courtyard and double garage. A paved path flanked by exotic garden beds leads to the impressive front portico, with leadlight windows surrounding the front door. Once inside, you're naturally drawn, via a welcoming lounge, to the breathtaking view of the bay - which is on display across the whole of the north-facing, open-plan living area.
A decorative fernery with its own watering system is a special feature at the eastern end of the room, and an intimate dining alcove sits in a central bay-window - taking in the superb coastal vista. The generous kitchen has a return bench with a 40mm Caesarstone top, an Electrolux wall oven, grill, and induction cooktop, an Asko dishwasher, and a walk-in pantry. A second lounge/entertainment area opens to the covered front terrace which is equipped with automatically retractable see-through blinds and an adjustable louvred roof - just the spot for a relaxed alfresco meal.
The master bedroom has a walk-through robe to a neat ensuite, while two more bedrooms have easy access to a main bathroom and powder room. There's also an office, a well-equipped laundry, an outdoor WC, a practice putting green, and even an entertainment gazebo at the edge of the expansive front lawn. Year-round comfort is provided by electric under-floor heating, split systems and ceiling fans throughout the home. In addition, and in close proximity to the house, is a large storage shed and workshop - big enough to take a boat and trailer, a ride-on mower, and more. Here, a superb lifestyle awaits - or the chance to subdivide and develop.
- Unique luxury home on huge block with spectacular bay views
- Grand open-plan living area with access to covered terrace
- Kitchen with Caesarstone benchtops and Euro-style appliances
- 3 bedrooms, (master with ensuite), bathroom, laundry, office
- Electric underfloor heating, split systems, and ceiling fans
- DLUG, storage shed, option to subdivide (Planning Permit).
Insights: 41-43 Clifton Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Charming Rustic Delight
If you desire the ultimate coastal lifestyle property; enter this beautifully appointed custom build showcasing one of a kind charm and character. This enviable land holding of 1,171m2 (approx.) is flanked by neighbouring parklands and delivers a truly tranquil setting. A substantial residence boasts grand proportions and it sits effortlessly within the green leafy surrounds. Earthy finishes including polished timber and slate flooring, exposed brick and timber panelled wall features further enhance a warm welcoming feel.
A stunning streetscape of native trees creates an anticipation for what is sure to be a memorable inspection
4 beautifully appointed bedrooms, all complete with built in robes
The primary living zone boasts grand proportions. A trio of feature windows take full advantage of a northerly aspect and promote a wonderfully light and bright feel.
The kitchen serves up a wonderful space with expansive benchtops, gas cooktop and a walk in pantry ensures excellent storage solutions.
A double garage with drive through access and additional off street parking provides room enough for the cars, boat, caravan and even the jet ski
An additional independent studio gives further flexibility to the potential living arrangements; it is powered and could be utilised as a teenage retreat, rumpus or even an arts studio/home office
As impressive as this residence is, it is its tranquillity and life style features that promotes it to one of the finest properties on the market. Landscaped native plantations, towering mature gum trees over to the neighbouring parklands, a chook run, various productive fruit trees, defined brick paved pathways, multiple water tanks and picturesque courtyards to take in an early morning coffee or a late glass of red from one of the award winning local wineries.
Beautifully positioned within the golden triangle with the water's edge only a short stroll away, the convenience of the Pinaroo Ave strip shopping, the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp literally just down the road and walking distance to local schools, kindergarten and day-care centre
All the modern comforts and a impressive inclusions list to be discovered on further inspection. A true opportunity to secure what can only be described as top shelf real estate
Insights: 22-24 Kiama Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Eureka!!
Just when you thought it had become the impossible dream! Enter this beautifully presented 3 bedroom 'home'; charming full renovation, character filled and boasting bay views for under $500,000! Eureka!!!
The primary living zone is a beautifully appointed open plan design; a Coonara creates a warm welcoming feel and a glass sliding door provides a seamless connection to the decked alfresco (boasting bay views and frames the granite peaks of the You Yangs).
3 generous bedrooms are light filled; the 3rd bedroom is currently a beauty salon and with its independent access is ideal for a home office/business.
The kitchen is character filled; expansive benchtops, excellent storage solutions, feature tile splashback and 900mm stainless steel gas cooktop.
A simply stunning renovation of the main bathroom will certainly turn heads; floor to ceiling tiles, custom vanity and luxurious shower.
A rustic inspired garden is truly tranquil; established trees, a fish pond, productive fruit trees and fairy lights create a wonderful peaceful garden setting. A custom studio finished with recycled timber and expansive windows sits effortlessly in its surrounds.
All the modern comforts and many more inclusions to be discovered upon inspection which definitely won't disappoint!!

Description:
Prime Bayside Living
Location does not get any better than this! Situated only a stone's throw to the water's edge, this is your chance to secure a piece of the sought-after Bellarine pie! With room to improve and add your own touches, this home offers itself in a multitude of ways.
The established and private front garden is low maintenance and offers a tranquil entrance to the home. Upon entry, you're greeted by a spacious open plan living area with sublime garden views and split system for year-round comfort, which effortlessly flows into the dining and kitchen space. The kitchen is fully equipped with gas cooktop, electric oven, stainless steel dishwasher, ample storage and breakfast bench. The rear of the ground level hosts 3 bedrooms, all with built-in-robes, which are serviced by the renovated central bathroom with shower, bath and vanity, separate toilet and large laundry with an abundance of storage.
Float upstairs to the top level and you will be truly in awe! A large open second living area encapsulates the stunning Bay views that are on offer, while also being equipped with a cozy wood fire and sliding door access to the wrap around balcony. Enjoying that morning coffee, evening wine or entertaining while overlooking the Bay has never looked so good! The master retreat also sits on the top level and offers a walk-in-robe and fully equipped ensuite. The flexible floorplan offers itself for the growing family, those who are wanting to enjoy the relaxed Bay lifestyle or would make for a savvy holiday home.
Sliding door access from the kitchen welcomes you to the undercover outdoor entertaining area and a large, lush open grass space. Situated upon a sizeable 585m2 block, one of the biggest draw cards to this home is the large driveway which leads you to the sizeable SLUG. With ample room for multiple cars, boats, caravans and all toys that the Bay lifestyle offers - There is room for all!
With the Bay, boat ramp, the Dell and Golf Course only a short stroll away, while all major amenities, supermarkets, schools, public transport at your fingertips, the lifestyle is here and waiting for you - The only thing left to do is to make your move!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Breathtaking Views
Showcasing panoramic bay views this solid built residence of epic proportions presents a wonderful opportunity for a savvy prospective purchaser! 4 bedrooms, expansive dual living zones, eye catching pool/spa setting and an oversized garage/workshop ensure this property is without a doubt one with the lot.
4 bedrooms; master complete with ensuite and walk in robe
The primary living zone is oversized by any measure and provides a wonderful orientation to capture the sweeping panoramic water views with the glass sliding door creating a seamless connection to a decked alfresco
The quality built timber kitchen serves up a wonderfully practical space with expansive bench tops, custom cabinetry, 900mm gas cook top and a walk in pantry
A 2nd independent living zone creates further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan
The garage/workshop is simply a handy man or woman's dream. The oversized double garage 7.4x8.1m (approx.) is complemented by a further area dedicated for a workshop (fully powered)
A lovely pool setting; an expansive timber deck and flanked by mature trees to create a truly private setting. A spa is sheltered by a cabana completing the ultimate entertainers' property
A wonderful home for today and the ideal property profile for someone looking to value add for a flip prospect

HOUSE AND CONTENTS , ALL OFFERS CONSIDERED !
Wow, what a home on a block approx 695m2. A flexible floorplan with an open plan living space, formal lounge, generous dining and well designed kitchen, all overlooking the huge undercover patio area. Entertain in style. 4 bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite. Central bathroom , laundry and powder room. Features include central heating, evaporative cooling, walk in pantry, and outdoor Pool. Relax and enjoy this position close to the Jetty, beach and primary school. Furniture can be part of the purchase as well. ALL OFFERS CONSIDERED!

Description:
QUIET COURT LOCATION WITH PLENTY OF SPACE ON OFFER
Well maintained family residence positioned in a lovely quiet court. On entry an impressive hallway immediately leads you to the sunken lounge with soaring ceilings and open fire place adjoining the formal dining area. Pine kitchen is well organised with dishwasher and a sense of open plan with an abundance of space for informal dining and family area with slate tiling and split system to cater for your all round comfort. Three bedrooms, the master having a lovely ensuite and the central bathroom servicing the remaining bedrooms with separate shower and spa bath. Externally the gardens are low maintenance and well maintained, single carport plus remote lock up garage. Water views are on offer from garden seated area and this well positioned home in a family friendly court will be highly sought by first home buyers or purchasers wanting extra space.

Description:
Million Dollar Views, Entry Level Buying!
Located in a highly sought-after yet tightly held pocket of Clifton Springs, this solid brick custom build will exceed all expectations! Offering sublime Bay views from almost all areas of the home and within an easy stroll to the waters edge, this is Bellarine living at it's best!
A high and secure front fence offers the utmost privacy, where you're welcomed to a well-manicured, low maintenance garden. The grand front entry offers stairs to the upper level, where you're welcomed by a separate and expansive lounge area, with versatile use for an adjoining formal dining/study nook. A fully equipped kitchen offers gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher, butlers' hutch and walk-in-pantry, while overlooking the open plan dining and 2nd living area all while encompassing the stunning Bay views. Cleverly zoned, the 3 bedrooms sit at the rear wing, with bedrooms 2 and 3 offering built in robes and the master with walk-in-robe, additional built-in-robes and views of the Bay and Beacon Point Reserve. The central bathroom offers 2-way access from the master, is equipped with a large vanity, bath and over-sized shower, while a 2nd separate powder room and laundry with sewing nook completes this neat as a pin package.
Outside offers a mature and established garden, with an undercover entertaining area and verandah boasting the perfect place to sit, read a book and enjoy the Bay! The DLUG offers internal and rear access, with plenty of room for additional cars, trailers, boats and all toys in between!
Additional features includes; Ducted vacuum, gas heaters in both living areas, split system heating and cooling, alarm system and access to under house storage
Offering that dream Bellarine lifestyle that so many are seeking, you are flanked for choice with this location. Moments to the Bay, Boat Ramp, Golf Club and public transport, and with all major shopping amenities, schools, wineries and cafes at your fingertips. The perfect holiday home, downsizer, investment or first home, this ticks all the boxes!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
STUNNING WATERFRONT VIEWS!
The north facing aspect of this home enjoys stunning water views of Corio Bay, Port Phillip Bay and the You Yangs from the open plan living area and front deck of this fabulous waterfront home in the tightly held Edgewater Drive, Clifton Springs.
This brilliant 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom family home on a 620m2 approx parcel of land features raked timber ceilings and a functional, practical floorplan with split system heating/cooling and ducted heating for year round comfort. The uninterrupted views of Port Phillip Bay and the You Yangs are breathtaking and you will enjoy feeling like you are always on holiday having the option of swimming in the privacy of your own backyard or in the pristine waters of the beach just across the road!
A delightfully maintained garden and a double garage for the storage of a boat or cars are a welcome addition to the home perfect for someone wanting to get a position on the water!

Description:
MODERN APPEAL WITH BAY VIEWS
This newly built modern home represents fantastic low maintenance living suitable for those looking to spend their time enjoying all the fabulous things that the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula has to offer including walking trails, pristine beaches and award winning wineries.
Downstairs comprises 2 bedrooms, a beautiful bathroom, laundry and sitting room leading out to a sunny courtyard whilst upstairs features a third bedroom and delightful kitchen, living & dining area with spectacular views of the bay, this really is the perfect opportunity to secure a brand new home suitable for weekend getaways or permanent living in a highly regarded pocket of Clifton Springs!
